action.action-desc: Mr. Pfluger (for himself, Mr. Arrington, Mr. Hamadeh of Arizona, Mr. Timmons, Ms. Boebert, Ms. Tenney, and Mr. Guest) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on House Administration

form.official-title: To prohibit the hiring of individuals who are not citizens of the United States to administer an election for Federal office in a State or local jurisdiction, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the No Foreign Persons Administering Our Elections Act.

section.header: Requirements with respect to hiring of election administrators for an election for Federal office

subsection.text: A State or local jurisdiction may not hire an individual who is not a citizen of the United States to administer an election for Federal office in the State or local jurisdiction.
This section shall apply with respect to any election for Federal office held on or after the date of the enactment of this Act.
